survey_name: Impact of Workplace Design on Employee Creativity Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand how office design and workspace environments influence employee creativity and innovation. It will gather feedback on physical spaces, collaborative areas, and personal work zones to inform future workplace design strategies.

questions.question_text: How would you rate your current workspace design in terms of fostering creativity?
questions.client_notes: Use a balanced 5-point Likert scale to capture nuanced opinions. Ensure mobile-friendly button sizing for touch selection.
